metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38020 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in contacts picker in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 96.0.4664.45 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
